Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Authorizes the New York State Energy Research and Development Authority to loan money to utility companies for purposes of capital expenditures
Summary: Authorizes the New York State Energy Research and Development Authority to loan money to utility companies for purposes of capital expenditures; authorizes the issuance of bonds.
LawCode: Amd ยง1854, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing the New York State Energy Research and Development Authority to loan money to utility companies for purposes of capital expenditures
